Dear Biliana / Dear Iskra,

 

We have completed our October deliveries to TIBIEL. We therefore send you our attached documents issued as per contract 2620TS000019 and according to the Escrow Agreement & Addendum, together with our release request for funds deposited on the Escrow Account.

 

The statement of deliveries is showing all quantities submitted in September: 700’000 KWh/day (totally 21’700 MWh). 

 

Please confirm that the attached documents are in order and transfer the amount of EUR 266,910.00 to our Kolmar NL B.V. account with Credit Europe Bank N.V. Amsterdam in line with our attached instructions. 

 

Please confirm the balance left on the Escrow account after payment in order to obtain TBL’s agreement to keep the balance on the Escrow account.

 

 

Thanks and best regards,

Silvia Lüdin
